title: OnOptions
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from OnOptions, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: How do you turn a baseball infield into a tennis court? It’s as complicated as it sounds
items.description: Tennis is experiencing a resurgence, with almost 26 million people playing in the U.S. alone. That number has been on an upward trajectory five years ...

items.title: U.S. vaccine advisers end decades-long recommendation for all babies to get a hepatitis B shot at birth
items.description: Several medical societies and state health departments said they would continue to recommend them.

items.title: So much of crypto is not even real—but that’s starting to change
items.description: Crypto has long felt like a giant casino with imaginary chips, but big recent breakthroughs mean it's fast becoming part of the real economy.

items.title: The Answer to the Return-to-Office Question Is More Nuanced That We Thought
items.description: Is going back to the office really all it’s cracked up to be?

items.title: Inside the Fortune 500 CEO pressure cooker: surviving is harder than ever and requires an ‘odd combination’ of traits
items.description: Mark Thompson is a top CEO coach and Byron Loflin is Nasdaq's in-house board whisperer. They told Fortune about joining forces for "CEO Ready."

items.title: Hershey’s Innovation Lab Just Created Its Own Dubai Chocolate Bar
items.description: You might have to temper your expectations—or find yourself a golden ticket.

items.title: UBS May Cut Further 10,000 Jobs by 2027
items.description: The bank did not confirm the number, but said it would ‘keep cuts as low as possible.’

items.title: Following in Paul Newman and Yvon Chouinard’s footsteps: There are more ways for leaders to give it away in ‘the Great Boomer Fire Sale’ than ever
items.description: As the president and CEO of Newman's Own, which gives away 100% of its profits, I am hearing from more and more business owners who want to try.

items.title: I analyzed thousands of TED Talks. Talking with hand gestures makes you look more competent

items.title: Costco Rival Brings Back Holiday Favorite Product
items.description: And it’s cheaper than the Kirkland version.

items.title: Supreme Court to reconsider a 90-year-old unanimous ruling that limits presidential power on removing heads of independent agencies
items.description: The court's conservatives, liberal Justice Elena Kagan noted in September, seem to be “raring to take that action.”
